body.title: Our Story
body.paragraph: OpenObserve was founded in 2022 with a vision to make observability more accessible, complete and cost-effective. OpenObserve emerged from the challenges of managing complex distributed systems. Our platform addresses the growing need for unified observability while dramatically reducing storage costs.

body.title: Our Commitment to Open Source
body.paragraph:
We built OpenObserve on a simple truth - the best tech grows in the open. Our open source foundation isn't just a checkbox; it's our lifeblood.

When observability tools hide their inner workings, everyone loses. That's why we've thrown open our codebase, letting you peek under the hood, tinker with the engine, or rebuild entire systems to fit your world.

Our community keeps us honest. Developers from Boston to Bangalore contribute code that solves real problems they've faced firsthand. This diversity of thought has taken us places we never would have discovered alone.

We're pragmatists about sustainability too. While our core platform remains free for all, our enterprise offerings fund the coffee that fuels our late-night coding sessions. This balance ensures OpenObserve stays both accessible and evolving.

body.title: Our People
body.paragraph:
We're problem-solvers scattered across continents who speak the language of systems at scale. Our engineers have battled production fires, optimized query engines, and designed architectures that handle billions of events daily.
